## Randomized Restaurant Recommender a.k.a Eatvisor
<div><h4><a href="https://davionchai.shinyapps.io/Eatvisor/" target="_blank">Click Me to Visit the App !</a></h4></div>

<div>
Now now, have you ever stumbled at deciding what to eat for your meal? Fret not! No more asking "where to eat"!
</div>
<hr>
<span style="color: red;">Eatvisor</span> is telling you the top 20 nearest restaurants based on your device location !

<div style="text-align: justify; text-align-last: center;">
<ul>
<li>Decide what to eat</li>
<li>Show where to eat</li>
<li>List what to eat</li>
<li>Graph down the ratings</li>
</ul>
</div>
